product_name: Soleus Flash Heart Rate Monitor - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether training for your tenth marathon or logging miles on the treadmill, the Flash lets you set personalized training zones and monitor your heart for optimal performance on every run.
short_description: Whether training for your tenth marathon or logging miles on the treadmill, the Flash lets you set personalized training zones and monitor your heart for optimal performance on every run.
